---
title: "package.json"
---

## High-level description
This is the `package.json` file for the `string_decoder` module, which is a part of Node.js core functionality ported for use in other environments. It provides configuration for the module, including its dependencies, scripts, and metadata.

## Symbols

### Package Information
#### Description
Defines the basic information about the package.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| name | "string_decoder" | The name of the package |
| version | "1.3.0" | The current version of the package |
| description | "The string_decoder module from Node core" | A brief description of the package's purpose |
| main | "lib/string_decoder.js" | The main entry point of the package |

### Dependencies
#### Description
Lists the runtime dependencies of the package.

| Name | Version | Description |
|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| safe-buffer | "~5.2.0" | A dependency used by the package |

### DevDependencies
#### Description
Lists the development dependencies of the package.

| Name | Version | Description |
|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| babel-polyfill | "^6.23.0" | Used for development purposes |
| core-util-is | "^1.0.2" | Used for development purposes |
| inherits | "^2.0.3" | Used for development purposes |
| tap | "~0.4.8" | Used for running tests |

### Scripts
#### Description
Defines npm scripts for various tasks.

| Name | Command | Description |
|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| test | "tap test/parallel/*.js && node test/verify-dependencies" | Runs tests and verifies dependencies |
| ci | "tap test/parallel/*.js test/ours/*.js --tap \| tee test.tap && node test/verify-dependencies.js" | Runs tests for CI environments |

### Repository
#### Description
Specifies the type and URL of the source code repository.

| Type | URL |
|:-----|:----|
| git | "git://github.com/nodejs/string_decoder.git" |

### Additional Metadata
#### Description
Provides additional information about the package.

| Field | Value | Description |
|:------|:------|:------------|
| homepage | "https://github.com/nodejs/string_decoder" | The project's homepage |
| keywords | ["string", "decoder", "browser", "browserify"] | Keywords for package discovery |
| license | "MIT" | The license under which the package is distributed |

## Dependencies
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| safe-buffer | Used as a runtime dependency, likely for safe buffer operations |

Note: The development dependencies are not included in the runtime package and are only used during development and testing.

This `package.json` file configures the `string_decoder` module, which is a part of Node.js core functionality made available for use in other environments, such as browsers through tools like Browserify. It specifies the package's dependencies, development tools, test scripts, and other metadata necessary for npm to manage the package.
